message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper discusses the features and requirements of virtual worlds from a user perspective and highlights the limitations of existing system architectures. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as virtual worlds heavily rely on graphics and visual representation. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is relevant as virtual worlds connect millions of people and contain various technologies. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society) is relevant as the paper discusses the shift of market value and change of user preference in shaping the features of virtual worlds. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as virtual worlds often involve multimedia elements such as audio and video.
